channel.title: How to ensure you are on the correct chain (Markets Client version)
channel.description:
## First, please follow these steps to identify which chain you are on:
### 1. Open the Markets Client, and click on "Settings" -> "Debug Console".
![1|279x274](upload://tZCw1M5f4xn6EPgHPH946krwc2i.png)
### 2. Then, within the console, type:
text=str(BLK.getblock("e89164a165df952a3bc4b80d9ea33c3be47baa2406bbd7c9bd04eb91bd11e23a"))
![6|475x500](upload://eEfNSPKjQTVfX0dZMv4TxaGurTQ.png)
### 3. **Then click "Execute code". If you see the block information, then you are on the correct chain:**
![7|469x499](upload://4On45ozRlF9EVnsLWVF8mUmmrRA.png)
### If your results are "block not found", then you are on the wrong chain, please follow the instructions in this article to update your client: ..../forum-archive/t/how-to-fix-the-chain-split-issue-on-market-client-mandatory-for-all-markets-client-users/2318
**_If your results are different from the two options above, please try the test again as the network was likely busy._**
For any further support issues please ask in the community support channel on Discord: **https://discordapp.com/invite/jRkjCxf**

item.title: How to ensure you are on the correct chain (Markets Client version)

item.title: How to ensure you are on the correct chain (Markets Client version)
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

First, please follow these steps to identify which chain you are on:

1. Open the Markets Client, and click on “Settings” -> “Debug Console”.

2. Then, within the console, type:

text=str(BLK.getblock("e89164a165df952a3bc4b80d9ea33c3be47baa2406bbd7c9bd04eb91bd11e23a"))

6.png500x526 11.4 KB

3. Then click “Execute code”. If you see the block information, then you are on the correct chain:

7.png499x531 22.4 KB

If your results are “block not found”, then you are on the wrong chain, please follow the instructions in this article to update your client:

How to fix the chain split issue on Market Client (**MANDATORY FOR ALL MARKETS CLIENT USERS**) Support
Please complete the following steps to download and install the new bootstrap and Market Client. *** Don’t forget to back-up your private keys in a secure location before starting! *** It is necessary to follow the steps in the correct order. Back up your “bitbaydata folder” before moving to step two. Depending on your operating system, the “bitbaydata” folder can be found in these locations: PC Users:** C:/BitBay/bitbaydata Linux Users:** ~/BitBay/bitbaydata Mac Users:** ~/Library > Applica…

If your results are different from the two options above, please try the test again as the network was likely busy.

For any further support issues please ask in the community support channel on Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/jRkjCxf

Read full topic
item.source: How to ensure you are on the correct chain (Markets Client version)
